Text:
Any questions regarding the torrent will be answered. Please rate and comment. I took a deep dive in searching and testing all the games inside.
If you can find ANY bootleg or hacked versions of KOF that are not present please notify me here. TY!
Downloading this torrent now and i cant wait! Xmen vs street fighter was my favorite, up until the point i played MVC 1. Thanks for the upload!
@sonic4482 I was about to add even more games... But I gave up... These are the ONLY ones that I like to play. Enjoy and seed!

Interesting collection but i have one question. If this is a MAME collection of fighting games, where are the mortal kombats, or the street fighters, or the tekken, is this just a collection of Neo-Geo fighting games or am i missing something

@ oldgreg1991 
Mortal Kombat ROMs are not properly emulated.
Tekken would require insane PC hardware to run on a MAME platform therefore i suggest u download any PS1 or PS2 emulator since theyd emulate it better... U catch my drift?
And Street Fighter... It just suxxx in my opinion.
Its badly drawn. Its game mechanics suck. Its music and sounds suck... But ofcourse YOU are free to add games... Just download a desired ROM, copy and paste it into ROMS directory, start the emulator, hit F5 to refresh the game list... Click on available and voila!
If you need help finding games Ill be glad to help.

Ne moga da izdarjam taka... 6te go napravq. Ve4e nqma da ti se nalaga da se krie6. Ostavil sam ti posledno saom6tenie v elit... pro4eti go. Sbogom.
